section.title: Description
section.p: This class represents the Role that a Person plays when he or she receives healthcare benefits as a Dependent of someone else who is the named beneficiary of a Health Policy.

stentry.p: "Indicates the insured’s relationship to the patient." - HL7 Version 2.8, IN1-17. Note that HL7 identifies a Code Table (Table 63) for this property, which currently contains 32 suggested values.

"Code indicating relationship of patient to cardholder." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 306-C6, Data Dictionary 201104). Possible values include: Cardholder; Spouse; Child; Student; Disabled Dependent; Adult Dependent; Significant Other; Not Specified; Other.
Note also that this property is derived; the value of this code could potentially be discerned by Role Link classes.
Pointer to (a Role of) the Person who is named as a beneficiary of a Health Policy. This is the Person of whom the Covered Patient is considered to be a Dependent.
